posts.post_content:
Just putting out an FYI, in case anything matches up with what you've got for sale...I am casually looking for the following cards, with strong color and registration, backs less important on the T206s...Interested in SGC-graded cards, but PSA equivalent ok too


T202 Tinker Evers Chance in VG or VG-EX 
Happily, this one should be relatively cheap, since it's the only card in the set that doesn't show Joe Jackson! :rolleyes:

T205 Lobert (VG-EX) - FOUND - thanks Cy!
T205 McGraw (VG-EX)
T205 Wheat (VG-EX)

T206 Herzog, Boston, (VG-EX)
T206 McGraw, with cap (VG-EX)
T206 McGlynn (VG or VG-EX)
T206 Newt Randall (VG or VG-EX) - FOUND - Thanks to Joe
T206 Joss pitching (VG or VG-EX)

Thanks!
Jason
